info.brief_description: Because of a malfunctioning experiment, Lauren is teleporting uncontrollably... naked.
info.description:
Lauren is a teenager with a scientist for a father who invents a teleportation device. After an explosion, Lauren finds herself teleporting to random places. She has no control over when it happens or where she’ll end up. If that wasn’t enough of a problem, the device only teleports organic material, meaning she’ll always be naked when she’s sent somewhere. Unless her father can find a way to save her, she might never stop teleporting.

Rules:

No killing of any characters and no rape.
Keep the story on Earth. No going to other planets or other dimensions.
